lines.text: [Music]
Last time on Trebuchet Village, the gang finally left the Whippet Woods and made their way
northeast towards Trebuchet Village.
They ran into some brave lions on the way who our heroes dispatched quickly, further making
themselves an enemy to this rebellious troop.
They settled in at the strange Penis Inn where they traded barbs with the bartender, stole
some drinks, and consorted with a moron named Timothy.
After agreeing to help Timothy's home town of Idiot Village where the townsfolk were
suffering from a variety of calamities, including a missing village idiot, the crew slept in
the inn and headed out the next morning.
Idiot Village was as destitute, plague ridden, and starving as Timothy had lamented.
While meeting with the mayor of Idiot Village to discuss how the gang would help, Patrick
Jodar insisted there was an election and that he was running against the mayor.
The mayor, about as smart as he looked, agreed that there was an election and rushed off to
prepare for a debate.
In the interim, Patrick snooped around the mayor's desk and found a resignation letter
signed by the village idiot, detailing how he was tired of being unappreciated for his
efforts helping the morons of Idiot Village and was leaving for good.
After an awesome debate, Patrick Jodard declared he was the mayor, made the former mayor, Ted,
into a sheriff.
Dogen had a tense but helpful conversation with Dogen the Dirt God and the heroes decided
to go to one of the caves the village idiot may be in.
In this case it would be headed north.
